stmt: SELECT id, time, z00_data record, CASE WHEN z07_rec_key IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END indexing FROM (

sub.stmt: SELECT /*+ ORDERED */ z106_rec_key id, MAX(RPAD(CONCAT(z106_update_date, LPAD(z106_time, 4, '0')), 12, '0')) time FROM foo01.z106

sub: z02_doc_number = z106_rec_key AND (z02_rec_key LIKE 'LOW  LFOO%' OR z02_rec_key LIKE 'LOW  LBAR%')
OFFSET 5000 ROWS FETCH NEXT 1000 ROWS ONLY

LEFT JOIN foo01.z07 ON id = z07_rec_key
